item.description:
Every Mom and Dad need some time out alone..... So why not come and meet other young parents and learn something new as well....an evening you will not forget.....Kosher Pickle making....... Have you ever wondered about Kosher Pickles? The Master Pickle Maker Guru Shmuel Marcus from Orange County, CA will host an evening at Chabad of Peabody to give you the low down. A night not to miss.

Shmuel Marcus, the Los Alamitos resident who calls himself the Pickle Rabbi has offered his culinary lessons in 150 cities.

Must RSVP $13 at www.Jewishpeabody.com (space is limited so your payment is your reservation the program will be at 7:00pm
A yummy array of Salads and other refreshments to enjoy as well
You also take home your very own jar of pickles valued at $5.

Happy Pickles...
Raizel

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: evening out for mom and dad
